name: Dantion Marble Statues Hypernetwork
description:
A hyper network trained on marble statues intended to give the statue look to humanoid characters. Works well with both realistic and anime models.

If you have a hard time getting it to work try using statue and made of marble as activation triggers somewhere in your prompt
